item.title: Web Test Automation in Lambda Way
item.description: 调整默认配置（设置内存和超时时间） 函数计算的模式内存是128 MB， 超时是3秒。 默认配置 pyppeteer无法正常工作。 aws lambda get-function --function-name webdriver { "Configuration": { "FunctionName": "webdriver", "FunctionArn": "arn:aws:lambda:ap-northeast-1:762491489154:function:webdriver", "Runtime": "nodejs12.x", "Role": "arn:aws:iam::762491489154:role/service-role/webdriver-role-3hxi35t5", "Handler": "index.handler", "CodeSize": 598, "Description": "", "Timeout": 63, "MemorySize": 1024, "LastModified": "2021-10-08T09:44:02.000+0000", "CodeSha256": "Ma8ntxB5UxdLSOdotZBnSGDuBUDI+XEGlggfpPlV/AI=", "Version": "$LATEST", "TracingConfig": { "Mode": "PassThrough" }, "RevisionId": "3c08812d-e958-4427-a47e-be628966be36", "Layers": [ { "Arn": "arn:aws:lambda:ap-northeast-1:764866452798:layer:chrome-aws-lambda:25", "CodeSize": 51779390 } ], 使用lambda layer https://github.com/shelfio/chrome-aws-lambda-layer 注意要使用相应分区 函数定义 const chromium = require('chrome-aws-lambda'); exports.handler = async (event, context, callback) => { console.
